property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the CjkGridPreference &#40;a Application or Document).

property.name: showAllLayoutGrids
property.shortdesc: If true, displays the layout grids.

property.name: showAllFrameGrids
property.shortdesc: If true, displays the frame &#40;story) grids.

property.name: minimumScale
property.shortdesc: The view magnification &#40;as a percentage) less than which grids do not appear. (Range: 5 to 4000)

property.name: snapToLayoutGrid
property.shortdesc: If true, objects snap to the layout grid.

property.name: layoutGridColorIndex
property.shortdesc: The layout grid color, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: colorEveryNthCell
property.shortdesc: Applies the grid color to every nth cell, where n is the value of this property.

property.name: singleLineColorMode
property.shortdesc: If true, applies the grid color from the the edge of the line. If false, applies the grid color from the corner of the frame.

property.name: icfMode
property.shortdesc: If true, uses ICF mode for grid cells. If false, uses virtual body mode.

property.name: useCircularCells
property.shortdesc: If true, cell shape is circular. If false, cell shape is rectangular.

property.name: showCharacterCount
property.shortdesc: If true, displays the character count for the frame.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CjkGridPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
